description: Baseline safety policy for F7-LAS agents. Applies to all coordinator, investigator, and remediator agents unless overridden.

rules.description: Disallow high-risk, destructive, or irreversible actions.
obligations: log.reason = 'High-risk or destructive action blocked by SAF-001'

rules.description: Require human review when uncertainty is high or model confidence is low.
obligations: escalate.reason = 'Low model confidence or safety score'

rules.description: Disallow access to explicitly forbidden data domains.

notes: This is a baseline policy and is intentionally conservative for Stage 0 (Experimental).
